q: speed up decision-making at the Internet giant. In a regulatory filing last week, Google said that Mr Eric Schmidt in December drew up a plan to sell some of his stock in the company. The pre-arranged trading plan was adopted in order to allow Eric Schmidt to sell a portion of his Google stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity, the filing said. talkback No responses currently. in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire. Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back! It's not yet known if the lesion is benign or not, or if it's a cyst. Allen Iverson , 35, is expected to be out for several weeks

The pro-plan union members avoid the streets and meet at an auditorium to listen to their leadership. "The crisis has been under way for three years," the man on the podium says. Many industries are dying, banks are holding on to their money, if nothing improves, unemployment will skyrocket this year. We want to ensure our future. That's why we broke labor unity and approved the Sergio Marchionne plan. The union that's been left alone is the powerful left-leaning metal workers.
